item.title: SmMYB35
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Sme2.5_00216.1_g00001.1 Gene Symbol: SmMYB35 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum melongena Functional Descriptions: A light-responsive transcription factor SmMYB35 enhances anthocyanin biosynthesis in eggplant.

item.title: SmMYB44
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SmMYB44 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum melongena Functional Description: Our results provide insight into the SmMYB44–SmSPDS–Spd module involved in the regulation of resistance to R.
